website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one racquetball kit that includes everything you need but the court itself.
pros: Python’s Deluxe Starter Kit bundles every piece of essential racquetball equipment — a racquet, racquetballs, eye protection, and a racquet cover or bag
The kit is offered in Beginner, Advanced, and Ultimate packages, which include higher quality pieces as you progress
Pick the set that’s right for your budget
cons: Certain users found the Beginner set lacking in durability

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for those that like to hit with speed.
customer_reviews.text: Great overall racquet, being lightweight and strung for a powerful hit. The eyewear fits well and is comfortable, the balls are pretty bouncy so beware of the speed once hit with this racquet. The bag holds everything together and is great for a beginner of this sport.
customer_reviews.author: Jadranka K.

customer_reviews.title: The price for the set is unmatched
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The racquet is sturdy and is great for a beginner or someone who plays infrequently. The goggles are not the most comfortable, but they don’t fog up. The bag is the selling point to the entire set. It’s large enough to hold 2 racquets and very durable. I’ve tried to price a similar set by piecing together the items and cannot match the price. This is an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Noticed immediate improvement in game play.
customer_reviews.text: It was a stretch for me to purchase a racquet for this price range ($129 at the time) for someone is is a recreational player. It has a large sweet spot and I feel like each shot has a little more power behind it with the same effort. I also noticed a big improvement when I’m stabbing or slapping at the ball. I always seem to make solid contact with this racquet which saves me in a lot of volleys. The grip did take me a few games to get used to, but will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Elbow_Grease

customer_reviews.title: Decent way to start
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get back int the sport except glove and shoes. The glasses are comfy for extended play and the balls are ballsy. The racquet is extremely light although has a TINY sweet spot. Meaning you gotta hit the ball very accurately. This is not a beginners racquet as the tiny sweet spot means the racquet is very unforgiving giving many low energy returns. A beginner would be better served with a racquet that is far more forgiving for imperfect racquet handling.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Silberman

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Price for the Ultimate Set!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Ultimate Set. You can't beet the price, the price of this racquet alone is $179.99. The only drawback I had is that I couldn't find the size of the grip in the description. Once I received my set I realized the size was 3 7/8 (LG), I was hoping it was 3 5/8. However, after playing with it, this size doesn't feel bad. The grip (Ektelon Vision II) is a nice rubber grip which provides excellent grip, especially if combined with a glove. So far I love the racquet. I also ended up receiving the "Python Extreme View Eye-guards" from the Advanced Set (which is not a bad thing).
customer_reviews.author: Yarinette Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: My skill level is a solid intermediate and I lost all my racket ball stuff in my last move. This package was perfect for me. The carrying case is nice. The glasses fit perfectly. The racket has a large sweet spot and fairly light. The gloves don't really fit my hand, but that isn't unusual. My hands are kind of big. All in all, I am very content with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mandt

customer_reviews.title: The bag is nice! It easily holds two rackets
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice! It easily holds two rackets, two sets of goggles, and multiple balls. The racket is very light weight....I bought another Head racket at Dicks Sporting Goods for $30 on its own, and it seems heavier. I am very happy with this kit as an introductory to racquetball. I'd highly recommend it for anyone getting into the sport...mainly because it comes with everything you need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Easily Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Used it 1x. Racquet broke near the handle. Buddy & I were both shocked when it happened.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Works great for me. *side note to Racquet Galaxy (seller). I apologize for giving you a bad seller feedback rating. It was a mistake and meant for another product I had ordered. I can't figure out how to remove or edit the feedback now.
customer_reviews.author: Troy@Protekt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best deal. Love it 🥰
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant at first but when I received my purchase you could tell that the company that put the kit together had the buyer in mind, the racket was perfect the glasses did not fog. This company has integrity. I definitely recommend this Racketball kit.
customer_reviews.author: Isis R. Pastrana

customer_reviews.title: Works well, big enough to carry all your gym needs
customer_reviews.text: The combination is nice, the bag is big enough to carry gym clothes, water bottle and towel to be a gym bag. Won’t really fit shoes with all the other stuff. Works great so far. Only complaint is that this is a bit expensive for the set.
customer_reviews.author: Caerul

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a great deal for a starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great deal for a starter kit. I am no expert but the racquet is pretty light and has a nice and grippy handle. The balls are one notch better than the standard you would buy and the carrying case is pretty nice. I don't like the goggles that much but they have adjustable ear pieces and will certainly work. For the price I think this is a pretty good "better than average" set.
customer_reviews.author: S Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Strings broke in under 1hr
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised that I did actually receive the EKTELON EXO3 Toron 150 ESP racquet with the set. The racquet is a $230 racquet. This was awesome. However, the strings popped on my second day of playing with it. I got less than 4 matches in with it. I will be reaching out to Amazon and to Ektelon for a replacement set of strings and cost to re-string.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set, gives you all the basics. Bag could be a little bigger/hold more, but it's perfect for tossing in the car and heading out to the gym quickly. Has an outside pocket to store your wallet/phone and all around is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Solid raquet, but carry bag is smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I will update if anything changes. I do wish the bag was a bit bigger, it just barely fits all the equipment for 2 people to play. I wish this set also came with a 2 person option with 2 raquets and 2 pairs of goggles. But I just bought the extra stuff elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: t.marrow

customer_reviews.title: A good set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: The set is all you need for the game, racket, balls, glasses and a glove. The only problem I had is racket weight. It’s too heavy for me. I wish they will clearly describe it on the website at the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: This racquetball set is good for me as a beginner
customer_reviews.text: This racquetball set is good for me as a beginner. I like the weight of the racquet and the grip. I’d recommend it for any beginner who doesn’t want to spend too much money going in to the sport.
customer_reviews.author: marc-henry wakim

customer_reviews.title: Great to start with
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I wanted to try out racquetball since our gym has a court. I purchased the beginner racquets and we’re both very satisfied with the product. This was a perfect set to begin playing with and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddyCash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent racquet.
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything in the kit. Lightweight racquet, great bounce in the balls, and the safety glasses fit fine. But the glove is labeled M-XL and should really be S-M. I’m 5’10” with average hands and it’s way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Marilynne

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is a set that includes a racquet, some balls and protective glasses. Unfortunately, the racquet broke after a couple uses and had to be returned. One side simply snapped. Hopefully it was just a bad racquet.
customer_reviews.author: FlipFlopsForever

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money hands down recommended to others
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made racquet feels good in the hand and is comfortable for returning a hard serve or fast return it has improved my game just a little by making my ball returns make it to the wall my previous racket they always fell short.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bag is not opaque
customer_reviews.text: A great deal for a racquetball starter kit. I'm by no means an athlete but it had everything I needed to jump into the sport. I did have a disappointing experience when I opened the box and found that the bag was clear, cheap plastic--totally worthless and awkward. No room for a towel and water bottle. Just felt mislead from the product images. I do like the racquet and the glasses are sporty and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as I have been using the Ektelon racquet that comes with it for a few years now and paying over $200 just for the racquet. Purchased one and definitely plan on purchasing a couple of more to have the on standby.
customer_reviews.author: Chad A. Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a serious racquetball player and just play for fun every once in awhile. This kit had everything I needed and everything was in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this racquet as a gift for a friend. Got it late November. It sat under a Christmas tree til the end of December. Started playing with it early January. It’s now February 26 and the racquet was broken a week ago. We don’t even play but a couple to a few times a week. Even at the top end, my buddy used this racquet 20 times in about a month and a half...maybe. The strings snapped. Do yourself a favor and buy a quality racquet.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hufty

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for our skill level
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it for the price. My husband got us these for Christmas. I like playing with them. The glasses, however, are not very effective. They fog up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit. The quality is what you'd expect in this price range. Would definitely recommend this set for someone just starting out. If you know what you're doing, you already know that you'd want better quality - and spend your money accordingly!
customer_reviews.author: FoolForChrist

customer_reviews.title: Is It Bait and Switch If Most Of The Items Arrive?
customer_reviews.text: This is slightly peeving.... When I ordered this set, the picture and description included Two canisters of balls and Two gloves, yet when it arrived... no gloves, only one canister of balls... Hmm? From the day I ordered it... March 26th... to the day it arrived March 29th, both the description and the picture changed. Guess I'll be taking screen shots of the things I order when I order them....
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael Gorday

customer_reviews.title: Great package
customer_reviews.text: Racquetball racquets arrived and we went to play the next day. Technology has changed much in the past 10 years and enjoyed the play time. Great racquet and package for the price. Definitely recommend for the intermediate to novice players. I am not an expert so cannot go there.
customer_reviews.author: Se Choi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Good product, exactly what I was I expecting. Separate from the star review. The glove was missing originally, but I contacted the seller and he replaced it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer  G.

customer_reviews.title: Start up kit
customer_reviews.text: Head is a very nice racquetball starter kit for someone starting out like me but is slightly heavier than an advance player racquet. Just keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sadler

customer_reviews.title: This one has a nice feel to it - strikes well and still gives ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new player to the sport, and was using a cheap club racquet. This one has a nice feel to it - strikes well and still gives me control and power. very happy with the purchase. The bag is great, as are the glasses. The balls, not so much - I live outside the US where they don't meet our country's specs. But very happy with rest of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Very good set
customer_reviews.text: I’m starting playing racketball , All my friends they agree is a good deal , well except the globe it won’t fit me , still happy
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy - my hubby and I play racquetball and decided to get our own set. This was perfect! It has everything we needed, and we just added a second racquet, which fits snugly in the case! Definitely recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy and Generous Vendor
customer_reviews.text: I received my bat in dec and for some reason after a month use I saw a crack near handle. I reached out to product team and they were generous enough to address that issue by providing replacement. Both old and new one I received were excellent in terms of performance. Must buy for intermidiate level playerd
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great deal, excellent price and quality . it's a beginners racket. Only problem is that my racket has is something rattling inside the frame, not sure what it is... Other than that it's great. I could send it back but since is my first racket I'll just keep and play it hard.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan D

customer_reviews.title: Good racquet.  Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: This racquet worked great. I bounced it off the side wall hard during my first game and it held up perfectly. With the glasses and racquetballs and a functional plastic case included it's a really good deal. I cannot tell any difference whatsoever between this racquet and more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: swum

customer_reviews.title: I got a superior product for half the price and more 😀
customer_reviews.text: Great value, the racket alone was 2x the price of the entire package 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If there is a better deal than this on Racquetball gear
customer_reviews.text: If there is a better deal than this on Racquetball gear, (there isn't) then go for it. Packaging and shipping were great. The bag was not folded or rolled up into a wrinkled mess...it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Signor

customer_reviews.title: Sick!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, nice racquet, nice glasses. I’m not sure if I got better, or if it was my new set, but I’m killing it all the sudden. Way better than the loaner I used at my local gym.
customer_reviews.author: Chitty

customer_reviews.title: Great Value (Super Strong)
customer_reviews.text: This was the best for the price. After reading all the negative reviews I was worried the strings would break but even though I only practice 4 days a week and my strings are unchanged. My only complaint is the tape on the handle is coming off but that is to be expected on any racket.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great racquet and set! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great racquet set. Love the glasses. They don’t fog, the balls seem faster than a basic set, he bag is in great condition, looks great. Overall, love the racquet itself too. Definitely hits harder than anything I’ve used before. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set for the Court
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, and sturdy. In racquetball the wall gets hit every now and then, don't even see any marks on the racquet. The balls are Penn so decent balls.
customer_reviews.author: CVT

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4-5 games
customer_reviews.text: Played with a cheap $15 racquet for 3 years. Finally decided to spend money on a “better” racquet and it lasted for 4 games. Now I am back to playing with the $15 racquet. It did not even last for 1 month. Very unhappy with this product. I just needed the racquet and have no use for the extras it came with. Look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Collier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Great package first time racquetball player and enjoying this racket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goggles bad but racquet is good
customer_reviews.text: Decent set. The goggles aren’t great as they fog up and I can’t see. For two entire matches I couldn’t see even after wiping them off with a towel. Bought different goggles with vent slots at and those work perfectly. As a starter kit the racquet and balls work fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: ... for my hubby for Xmas & he was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for my hubby for Xmas & he was very happy with it. I also received it as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Griffith

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised of the value. I received the Ektelon EXO 3 160 as advertised with the python bag, python glasses, and a new sleeve of Dunlop balls. Amazing price for what you get in the ultimate pack.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: We have played many games, and everything is still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: FishyBirdMLSTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit!
customer_reviews.text: It exactly as described. The racquet swings good; the balls are good, the goggles is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherEvaluator

customer_reviews.title: Nice little starter set
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and undamaged. Rackets and balls make an excellent starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Setup
customer_reviews.text: Good starter Racquet for those learning the sport, no issues yet : )
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. O.

customer_reviews.title: The plastic frame breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: The kit is too expensive for its quality. It says that this is a kit for beginner, it is not uncommon that the beginners hit the ball with the frame. However, the plastic frame of mine broken after just only one hit with the ball.
customer_reviews.author: NCL

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. Really loved the look the feel and the quality of the stringing through the handle. He can’t wait to put it to real use after all this is over.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used my racquet for the first time today. ...
customer_reviews.text: I used my racquet for the first time today. Both my training partner and the gym manager could not tell a difference between it and a pro style.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I'm always hesitant to leave reviews so soon after purchase because you just don't know how a product is until you've used it awhile. However, so far so good. The product arrived quickly, as promised, and it looks like an excellent purchase. Can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready,Set, Go...
customer_reviews.text: All set and ready to go play ball! Perfect complete set! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: All the equipment and materials are great, the only thing I don't like is that ...
customer_reviews.text: All the equipment and materials are great, the only thing I don't like is that the strap on the case is a little thin and short for me, but I didn't pay much for a case so I guess I can't really complain. The glasses are also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Miner

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the package. As a beginner in racquetball, this set was very useful. I did not really need the glasses, or at least, it would be nice if they were ones that cold go over regular glasses, but the racquet and the balls, and the bag they come with, are all very nice, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Oren

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great buy! I also bought another racquet and I’m able to fit 2 racquets, 3 balls and 2 glasses into the whole bag
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great value but check the contents...
customer_reviews.text: I like item however I did not receive the glo e that was listed as a part of the package. Otherwise, as a novice racquetball player I was relatively pleased with the set. Now if only I can get the glove owed to me.....
customer_reviews.author: Tombra Peters

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Like I could buy everything I needed in a package deal instead of purchasing everything separately. I’m not going to be a competitive player & need a top of the line gear. Quality product for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: dteddy

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Nice racquet. Safety glasses are very cheap quality. Case is practical. Great for a beginner!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I have paid over $170 for the racquet alone! Great deal. I love this racquet but it breaks fairly easily. Bag is good. Not as big as some but not too small. Cheap glasses, but work.
customer_reviews.author: ScottM

customer_reviews.title: Quality products
customer_reviews.text: Played first game using the kit. The racquet is just right for the weight and size of the racquet. The goggles were very clear and stayed on with no issues. Highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So far we are happy with the purchase- we bought 2 sets about 2 months ago. Quality looks good. We are beginners so our opinion might be wrong :)
customer_reviews.author: Very Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: The racket was damaged either prior to or occurred during ...
customer_reviews.text: The racket was damaged either prior to or occurred during the first time it was used it for play (1 hour) and I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: AEG

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Just what i needed to start playing again. Racquet is good for an intermediate and bag is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J

customer_reviews.title: Nice racquet, cheap accessories
customer_reviews.text: The bag was broken. They sent a replacement but it’s very cheaply made. Racquet has been used twice - no complaints. Goggles look good. Kinda cheaply made tho
customer_reviews.author: John Beattie

customer_reviews.title: A good package for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: Decent racket, lightweight perfect for a beginner... glasses, a set of racketballs, glove and carry case. A value for the money
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter rackets for my two sons. We frequent the YMCA and often they are short on rentals. I feel the price is correct for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like good quality products! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ced&Anna

customer_reviews.title: Solid value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for quality. We've used the racquet, balls and goggles may times and they are holding up very well. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Super Duper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit. Racquet (racket?) is quality, handle is well taped, balls are bouncy, and the goggles don't fog up. Would recommend to anyone looking for a total starting package.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect value for getting started playing raquetball!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Starter Kit for Raquetball! Love that it came with a cover for the raquet!
customer_reviews.author: VGRandolph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality set for a casual player. I've used this set about 20 times without any concern for build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great pack for a beginner - novice player. Excellent price. If you need starter kit this is the one to get for the the price. Would recommend this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Berkel

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This arrived very promptly and is a great set for my husband who wanted to get going again. You can't beat the quality for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Broken item
customer_reviews.text: Broken product . Not sure if they even checked before sending.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but great for an occasional player or beginner
customer_reviews.text: Not for a serious player, but great for an occasional player or beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqulyn D. Munns

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: quick delivery and items are as described. Nice quality products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for an intermediate racquetball player
customer_reviews.text: Great value for an intermediate racquetball player. I play once a week, this set allows me to use a quality racquet instead of using default gym equipment (racquet, balls, eye protection). Quick delivery too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on great gear.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent racquet at an excellent price. The fireballs included are game changers.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Dahlstrom

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything you need to get started on some serious play...arrived quickly and for a beginners set the racquet is great with some nice heft and good power. very pleased...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Love that they give you a bag to store it all. It is a great starter kit for a beginner to get a feel for racquetball.
customer_reviews.author: N Shah

customer_reviews.title: racquet is just as strong today as it was when I bought it and is a great size/weight. Feel like it was a great value
customer_reviews.text: Owned for 6 months, I play 2-3 times per week, racquet is just as strong today as it was when I bought it and is a great size/weight. Feel like it was a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Branman

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t recd glasses with product and can’t figure out how to share this information with amazon
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Younghans

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe Racquetball Starter Kit Series
customer_reviews.text: I found your product to be exactly what I needed. I was glad that all the items were in one package and that I didn't have to purchase them separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Every thing was as in the package as advertised. I bought as a gift for new player and just loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Herschel Thach Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price, can’t wait to get it to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt Yoshimura

customer_reviews.title: Broke after using twice
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice racquet, but i used it twice and it broke clean through where it was strung.
customer_reviews.author: dave dotson

customer_reviews.title: The recipient enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.text: It was given as a gift. The recipient enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit for a beginner like me
customer_reviews.text: Good starter kit for a beginner like me. I'm happy with the purchase. Plus you look pretty sweet walking into the gym with the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Lightle

customer_reviews.title: Racquet with no sweet spot and quality of Racquet is very poor( not ...
customer_reviews.text: Racquet with no sweet spot and quality of Racquet is very poor( not worth the money). Definitely Racquet performance is not as advertised. 1 month return window expired and unfortunately Amazon cannot do anything even for a frequent user of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Shwan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good! Love it!! Got it as a gift. Very nice racquet to use for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The glove is one size fits “all” so on a small woman it is big. The kit has a great value
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Racquet and goggles are fine, but zipper and strap broke 2nd time I used it
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cojocaru

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great price. This was exactly what I was looking for. I bought two, one for myself and one for my dad.
